verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Send <S%H7971><s%> thou men, <S%H376><s%> that they may search <S%H8446><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H589><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> of every tribe <S%H4294><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%> shall ye send <S%H7971><s%> a <S%H259><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> every one <S%H3605><s%> a ruler <S%H5387><s%> among them.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> them from the wilderness <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4057><s%> of Paran: <S%H6290><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> those <S%H1992><s%> men <S%H376><s%> were heads <S%H7218><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
And these <S%H428><s%> were their names: <S%H8034><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> Shammua <S%H8051><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zaccur. <S%H2139><s%>
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> Shaphat <S%H8202><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hori. <S%H2753><s%>
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh. <S%H3312><s%>
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> Igal <S%H3008><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph. <S%H3130><s%>
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> Oshea <S%H1954><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun. <S%H5126><s%>
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> Palti <S%H6406><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Raphu. <S%H7505><s%>
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> Gaddiel <S%H1427><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Sodi. <S%H5476><s%>
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> namely, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> Gaddi <S%H1426><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Susi. <S%H5485><s%>
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan, <S%H1835><s%> Ammiel <S%H5988><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gemalli. <S%H1582><s%>
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Asher, <S%H836><s%> Sethur <S%H5639><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Michael. <S%H4317><s%>
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> Nahbi <S%H5147><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Vophsi. <S%H2058><s%>
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> Geuel <S%H1345><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Machi. <S%H4352><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the men <S%H376><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to spy out <S%H8446><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%> And Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Oshea <S%H1954><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> Joshua. <S%H3091><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> them to spy out <S%H8446><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Get you up <S%H5927><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> way southward, <S%H5045><s%> and go up <S%H5927><s%> into <S%H854><s%> the mountain: <S%H2022><s%>

And see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is; and the people <S%H5971><s%> that dwelleth <S%H3427><s%> therein, <S%H5921><s%> whether they <S%H1931><s%> be strong <S%H2389><s%> or weak, <S%H7504><s%> few <S%H4592><s%> or <S%H518><s%> many; <S%H7227><s%>

And what <S%H4100><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> is that <S%H834><s%> they <S%H1931><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in whether it <S%H1931><s%> be good <S%H2896><s%> or <S%H518><s%> bad; <S%H7451><s%> and what <S%H4100><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> they be that <S%H834><s%> they <S%H1931><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in, <S%H2007><s%> whether in tents, <S%H4264><s%> or <S%H518><s%> in strongholds; <S%H4013><s%>

And what <S%H4100><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> is, whether it <S%H1931><s%> be fat <S%H8082><s%> or <S%H518><s%> lean, <S%H7330><s%> whether there be <S%H3426><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> therein, or <S%H518><s%> not. <S%H369><s%> And be ye of good courage, <S%H2388><s%> and bring <S%H3947><s%> of the fruit <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6529><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%> Now the time <S%H3117><s%> was the time <S%H3117><s%> of the firstripe <S%H1061><s%> grapes. <S%H6025><s%>

So they went up, <S%H5927><s%> and searched <S%H8446><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> from the wilderness <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4057><s%> of Zin <S%H6790><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> Rehob, <S%H7340><s%> as men come <S%H935><s%> to Hamath. <S%H2574><s%>

And they ascended <S%H5927><s%> by the south, <S%H5045><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> Hebron; <S%H2275><s%> where <S%H8033><s%> Ahiman, <S%H289><s%> Sheshai, <S%H8344><s%> and Talmai, <S%H8526><s%> the children <S%H3211><s%> of Anak, <S%H6061><s%> were. (Now Hebron <S%H2275><s%> was built <S%H1129><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Zoan <S%H6814><s%> in Egypt.) <S%H4714><s%>

And they came <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the brook <S%H5158><s%> of Eshcol, <S%H812><s%> and cut down <S%H3772><s%> from thence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> a branch <S%H2156><s%> with one <S%H259><s%> cluster <S%H811><s%> of grapes, <S%H6025><s%> and they bore <S%H5375><s%> it between two <S%H8147><s%> upon a staff; <S%H4132><s%> and they brought of <S%H4480><s%> the pomegranates, <S%H7416><s%> and of <S%H4480><s%> the figs. <S%H8384><s%>

The place <S%H4725><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> the brook <S%H5158><s%> Eshcol, <S%H812><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H182><s%> of the cluster of grapes <S%H811><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> cut down <S%H3772><s%> from thence. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%>
And they returned <S%H7725><s%> from searching <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8446><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> after <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7093><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

And they went <S%H1980><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Paran, <S%H6290><s%> to Kadesh; <S%H6946><s%> and brought back <S%H7725><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> unto them, and unto all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> and showed <S%H7200><s%> them <S%H853><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

And they told <S%H5608><s%> him, and said, <S%H559><s%> We came <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> thou sentest <S%H7971><s%> us, and surely <S%H1571><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> floweth <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey; <S%H1706><s%> and this <S%H2088><s%> is the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of it.

Nevertheless <S%H657><s%> <S%H3588><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> be strong <S%H5794><s%> that dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> and the cities <S%H5892><s%> are walled, <S%H1219><s%> and very <S%H3966><s%> great: <S%H1419><s%> and moreover <S%H1571><s%> we saw <S%H7200><s%> the children <S%H3211><s%> of Anak <S%H6061><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

The Amalekites <S%H6003><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the south: <S%H5045><s%> and the Hittites, <S%H2850><s%> and the Jebusites, <S%H2983><s%> and the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the mountains: <S%H2022><s%> and the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and by <S%H5921><s%> the coast <S%H3027><s%> of Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

And Caleb <S%H3612><s%> stilled <S%H2013><s%> <S%H853><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> before <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Let us go up at once, <S%H5927><s%> <S%H5927><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> it; for <S%H3588><s%> we are well able <S%H3201><s%> to overcome <S%H3201><s%> it.

But the men <S%H376><s%> that <S%H834><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him said, <S%H559><s%> We be not able <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3808><s%> to go up <S%H5927><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the people; <S%H5971><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H1931><s%> are stronger <S%H2389><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> we.

And they brought up <S%H3318><s%> an evil report <S%H1681><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they had searched <S%H8446><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The land, <S%H776><s%> through which <S%H834><s%> we have gone <S%H5674><s%> to search <S%H8446><s%> it, is a land <S%H776><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> eateth up <S%H398><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> thereof; and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H834><s%> we saw <S%H7200><s%> in <S%H8432><s%> it are men <S%H376><s%> of a great stature. <S%H4060><s%>

And there <S%H8033><s%> we saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the giants, <S%H5303><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Anak, <S%H6061><s%> which come of <S%H4480><s%> the giants: <S%H5303><s%> and we were <S%H1961><s%> in our own sight <S%H5869><s%> as grasshoppers, <S%H2284><s%> and so <S%H3651><s%> we were <S%H1961><s%> in their sight. <S%H5869><s%>
